description: Consignment information for a movement (arrival, departure). Localised extensions allowed.

originAddress.description: Origin address - should actually be a $ref to schema.org/organization.

destinationAddress.description: Destination address - should actually be a $ref to schema.org/organization.

loadingDateTime.description: Date and time animals were loaded for transport, including time zone (UTC preferred).

unloadingDateTime.description: Date and time animals were unloaded after transport, including time zone (UTC preferred).

expectedDuration.description: Expected duration of transportation in hours.

transportOperator.description: Transport operator official name (should really be schema.org/organization).

vehicle.description: Identification of the vehicle (for example, licence plate).

isolationFacilityUsed.description: True if an isolation facility was used for the movement.

farmAssuranceReference.description: Identification reference of a farm assurance operation.
